channel.title: Shaikh Mahad's Technical Writing
channel.description: A collection of articles on backend engineering, system design, and performance.

item.title: Why I chose Recursive Descent for my Math Parser
item.description: Exploring the trade-offs between Shunting-Yard algorithm and hand-written recursive descent parsers for mobile-constrained environments.

item.title: Optimistic vs Pessimistic Locking in Spring Boot
item.description: A deep dive into handling concurrency in inventory management systems and when to use `@Version` annotations.
